name: Hummingbird
description:
Hummingbird is an infinite procedural musical exploration game.

Built around a complex set of synthesizers and procedural behaviours and colour palettes, the world you encounter will be different each time you play.


Hummingbird comes with a 16-page pdf manual, and paying $10 (or more) will get you access to a 12-page pdf zine, each page of which is filled with dense, hand-lettered text originally generated by the game itself.

Physical (hand-bound) copies of both the zine and the manual are also available for an additional charge.

Note: if ordering a physical copy of the zine, please make sure you enter an address on the game's download page so I know where to send it, thanks :)

Hummingbird is best played with a twin-stick gamepad, though keyboard controls are also available.

Source code included.
